definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

pinyin: lie4 hu4 zuo4 liu2 xing1 yu3

sentences.english: Many of Meteor Shower's ads fall in that category.
sentences.chinese: 《流星雨》中的很多广告就分属此类。

sentences.english: In the northern hemisphere, this meteor shower should be observed 3 hours before sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 在北半球，本次流星雨应在日出前3小时投入观测。

sentences.english: Every year, people look forward to the Perseid meteor shower.
sentences.chinese: 每年，人们都很期盼英仙座流星雨。

sentences.english: The shower is caused when the Earth passes through a trail of debris left by comet Thatcher (C/1861 G1).
sentences.chinese: 流星雨是当地球经过彗星的轨道时产生的。

sentences.english: Before dawn, the constellation Perseus – radiant point of the Perseid meteor shower – is close to overhead.
sentences.chinese: 天亮之前，英仙座流星雨的流星将接近头顶上空。

sentences.english: If a batch of meteoroids comes from the same comet, the meteor shower is formed.
sentences.chinese: 如果一批流星体来自同一颗彗星，形成的就是流星雨。

sentences.english: It is the most noteworthy Leonids meteor shower to date.
sentences.chinese: 因为这年的流星雨成为迄今为止最为壮观的。

sentences.english: The dazzling meteor shower horizon, zedoary were recorded in the beginning of the well-being.
sentences.chinese: 天边那璀璨流星雨，记载着莪们的幸福开始。

sentences.english: This is the annual Orionid meteor shower.
sentences.chinese: 这就是每年的猎户座流星雨。

sentences.english: Your tape-recorder will die during the most active period.
sentences.chinese: 你的录音机在流星雨最活跃的时候会出故障。

sentences.english: It is the most noteworthy Leonids meteor shower until now this year.
sentences.chinese: 这是今年迄今为止最为壮观的流星雨。

sentences.english: Usually Lyrid meteor watchers see only a drizzle.
At the top of many people in thorough, hoping to see the meteor shower .
sentences.chinese: 许多人在山顶上彻夜未眠，希望能看到流星雨。

sentences.english: Meteor shower is one of the most romantic spectacle Sky.
sentences.chinese: 流星雨是最富浪漫色彩的天象奇观。

sentences.english: The Geminid meteors will streak across the heavens from late night till dawn.
sentences.chinese: 双子座流星雨将横跨天堂从深夜直到黎明。

sentences.english: Check out the science and history of the Perseid meteor shower.
sentences.chinese: 查看一下英仙座流星雨的历史和科学知识。

pinyin: lie4 hu4 zuo4 liu2 xing1 yu3

definition: an annular eclipse of the sun
